body:
At 27.06.2002 04:02, Robert wrote:
>One last note, short of rewriting my shell script in perl, is there a way 
>to round the rcalc output to two decimal points?


Simply use this:


rcalc -e '$1=floor($1*100+.5)/100;'
___
